definitions.title: vb. Hithp.
definitions.body: contend (perh. orig. cling to (in strife), cf. Ar. 9a4iqa cling with love (Lag:BN 143); Syr. 9saq, Ethpa. be difficult (i.e. indignant, hostile); NH [[עָסַק]], Targum [[עֲסַק]], busy oneself, NH [[עֵסֶק]] business, occupation);—Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְעַשְּׂקוּ עִמּוֹ]] Ge 26:20 they contended with him.
